home.title: Empowering African NGOs for a Sustainable Future
home.subtitle: REPONGD-Afrique supports civil society organizations across Africa with strategic and sustainable assistance.

about.title: Who are we?
about.paragraph1: REPONGD-Afrique supports civil society organizations in Africa with innovative and sustainable strategies for significant impact.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to transform African NGOs into real catalysts for sustainable development.

home.axesIntro: Discover the main lines guiding our interventions for lasting impact.

donate.title: Contribute to Change
donate.description: Your donation helps us continue our mission: supporting African NGOs and strengthening their lasting impact on communities.

about.title: About REPONGD-Afrique
about.content: Your About content here in English.

items.title: Creation, Organization, and Structuring
items.description: Support NGOs in their establishment, internal organization, and legal structuring.

items.title: Professionalization and Certification
items.description: Strengthen technical skills and certify processes for greater credibility.

items.title: Resource Mobilization
items.description: Develop innovative strategies to ensure sustainable project funding.

items.title: Cooperation and Partnership
items.description: Promote synergies between NGOs and partners for effective collective actions.

items.title: Communication and Visibility
items.description: Enhance NGO visibility to mobilize resources and raise public awareness.

items.title: Sustainability
items.description: Encourage environmentally friendly and socially responsible projects.

donate.description: Your donation helps us continue our mission: supporting African NGOs and strengthening their lasting impact on communities.
